description: Defines dynamic user input schema for the Web Scraper & Data Extractor agent. Users can enter any valid URLs or upload HTML snapshots for structured extraction.

urls.description: A list of webpage URLs from which the agent will extract structured data (title, price, availability, specs).

html_snapshots.description: Optional pre-downloaded HTML snapshot content for offline extraction when live fetch is disabled.

use_gemini_ai.description: If true, the agent uses Gemini API and NLP to infer optimal CSS selectors automatically.

save_to_sqlite.description: If true, saves snapshots and extraction results to local SQLite for reproducibility.
